name: AnaplasmosisTestsForAnaplasmaSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Anaplasmosis (Tests for Anaplasma species Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Anaplasma species Nucleic Acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Anaplasma Nucleic Acid; 

VSAC query: Anaplasma probe/non-probe),(Exclusion Criteria: panel test)
